inclusion.criterion: history of medial and lateral elbow pain for at least three months in duration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: local tenderness for at least three months in duration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pain on the epicondyle upon active resistive flexion (medial) and extension (lateral)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous elbow conservative managements such as physical therapy and elbow injection-based therapies
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: previous surgical management of the elbow
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, likely due to acute perforated appendicitis. He is now a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
